title: "Discover it" sans / script-like italic - Fedra Sans / ??? {Akira/???}
content:
Hi there.

Does anyone know what fonts are used in these examples.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sans.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019133035/http:/typophile.com/files/sans.png) | 7.17 KB |
| [script.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019133035/http:/typophile.com/files/script_2.png) | 6.09 KB |
author: AnalogSystm

comments.content: The sans serif reminds me of [Fedra Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019133035/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/typotheque/fedra_sans_20/) designed by [Peter Biľak](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019133035/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Peter%20Bi%C4%BEak).

Fedra could be right.  
Small preview but the looks like it. Close enought.

Thanx.

---  
Oscar Bjarna  
 [http://analog.sys.is](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019133035/http:/analog.sys.is/ "http://analog.sys.is")
